abilities.name: Silver Tongues
abilities.description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Command, Consort, or Sway (up to a max rating of 3).

abilities.name: Accord
abilities.description: Sometimes friends are as good as territory. You may count up to three +3 faction statuses you hold as if they are turf.

abilities.name: The Good Stuff
abilities.description: Your merchandise is exquisite. The product quality is equal to your Tier+2. When you deal with a crew or faction, the GM will tell you who among them is hooked on your product (one, a few, many, or all).

abilities.name: Ghost Market
abilities.description: Through arcane ritual or hard-won experience, you have discovered how to prepare your product for sale to ghosts and/or demons. They do not pay in coin. What do they pay with?

abilities.name: High Society
abilities.description: It's all about who you know. Take -1 heat during downtime and +1d to gather info about the city's elite.

abilities.name: Hooked
abilities.description: Your gang members use your product. Add the savage, unreliable, or wild flaw to your gangs to give them .

abilities.name: Patron
abilities.description: When you advance your Tier, it costs half the coin it normally would. Who is your patron? Why do they help you?

abilities.name: Veteran
abilities.description: Choose a special ability from another crew.

claims.name: Local Graft
claims.description: +2 coin for show of force or socialize

claims.name: Lookouts
claims.description: +1d to Survey or Hunt on your turf

claims.name: Luxury Venue
claims.description: +1d to Consort and Sway on site

claims.name: Surplus Caches
claims.description: +2 coin for product sale or supply

claims.name: Cover Identities
claims.description: +1d engagement for deception and transport plans

custom.name: Hawkers' Rigging (1 carried item is concealed and has no load)
